Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Welcome back, Commandant. I, great Lucia, have been waiting for you for ages!', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'And I, Lee, have been doing the same.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Should I talk like that too? Okay, here goes. I, Ayl... No, I, Liv, have also been waiting for you.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Mm, that wraps up the Gray Raven intro.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You're not Gray Raven!", 3: '15', 4: 'What are you guys doing?', 5: '16'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "We're the new Gray Raven.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'We are an imitation of Gray Raven.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Aw shucks, ya blew it!', 4: '1'}
{2: "What's going on...?", 3: '19', 4: 'And the truth is...?', 5: '19'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Because you've been away for too long, Commandant, the real Gray Raven was disbanded by HQ not long ago.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Nanami seems to be hiding something, but Ayla chimes in and reveals the surprising truth.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'If Gray Raven was disbanded, then why is the office still here? Why are those three still standing there? Just as you are about to ask...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Stop messing around, you three. Come over and give me a hand.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The office door swings open with a familiar voice. You turn and see that familiar blue silhouette—Lee.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee?', 3: '30', 4: 'I thought Gray Raven was disbanded?', 5: '31'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Why do you look so surprised...? You didn't really get fooled by those three, did you?", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's just a prank from Nanami and the others... Don't take it seriously, Commandant.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Indeed. That was another prank by Nanami and the others, though I am surprised at their level of commitment to the gag, volunteering for housesitting duty.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Bianca and Karenina follow. The two Purifying Force members and Lee seem to be carrying something.'}
{2: "What's that you got there?", 3: '37', 4: 'Here, let me help.', 5: '38'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Hmph, this here is a little something Bianca and I prepared. Telling you would ruin the surprise!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "You're the star today, so you sit your Commandant butt down on the sofa... Don't pull another one of your disappearing acts on me again, okay?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Karenina is as thorny and biting as ever, yet you can hear telltale signs of joy mixed therein.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "You're back. As expected, Commandant. May we come in?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Sure thing! Oh, and I'm sitting next to Commandant!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Kamui... looks like you've got to re-learn your manners.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After the Purifying Force came Strike Hawk. Unlike the charitable Chrome, Kamui just plonks himself next to you and fishes a small terminal from his pocket.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Since Watanabe couldn't make it, he asked me to pass along this message...", 4: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Commandant of Gray Raven, it's been a while since we parted ways. I wonder how you're doing... No, this is not meant as a greeting.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Anyway, I look forward to our next meeting, 【kuroname】.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Watanabe prepared a long speech, but it was reduced to these two sentences by the time I received it. I guess the deleted part is saved for when you two meet.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Ah, Liv and Lucia are back.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant, oh... it's really you. I thought...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Liv, we agreed there would be no tears today.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Anyway, welcome back... Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What is all this?', 3: '70', 4: 'Are you guys preparing for something?', 5: '71'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I gathered everyone here to welcome you back to Babylonia. I know you like a good party.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "A welcome back party for you... Actually, I've never done this before. Good thing is everyone's enthusiastic about pitching in.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, I don't know if there will be more missions that require you to be away for such a long time, but at least you'll be staying for the near future, right?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So, once again, Commandant, let me be your blade and your strength!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Now, now, Lucia, you can't keep Commandant all to yourself today.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't think we're on the same page...", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Well, now that everyone's here, and Commandant's back, let's say that thing together!", 4: '3'}
